pullrequest.title: Deprecate functions to set linear/angular acceleration

content.raw:
Thanks for making the new PR!

A small suggestion is to add a comment saying deprecated next to the protected variables, so when we grep for deprecations we find them and remove them.
content.html:
Thanks for making the new PR!

A small suggestion is to add a comment saying deprecated next to the protected variables, so when we grep for deprecations we find them and remove them.

pullrequest.title: Deprecate functions to set linear/angular acceleration

content.html:
Oh and to avoid deprecation warnings, we should also remove the lines where these functions are called, like these ones:

-  this->SetAngularAccel(ignition::math::Vector3d::Zero);
-  this->SetLinearAccel(ignition::math::Vector3d::Zero);

pullrequest.title: Deprecate functions to set linear/angular acceleration

content.raw: Sounds good, I just made these changes. I commented the affected lines so we have a reference of what was originally done, before it's taken out completely in Gazebo 10. Or you think it would be better to remove them completely?
content.html: Sounds good, I just made these changes. I commented the affected lines so we have a reference of what was originally done, before it's taken out completely in Gazebo 10. Or you think it would be better to remove them completely?

pullrequest.title: Deprecate functions to set linear/angular acceleration

content.html:
Ah sorry, I just saw a few calls to the functions which are probably triggering deprecation warnings, could you please remove them or add pragmas to ignore deprecation warnings (like this)? 

gazebo/physics/Model.cc:717:      (*iter)->SetLinearAccel(_accel);
gazebo/physics/Model.cc:731:      (*iter)->SetAngularAccel(_accel);

Also, feel free to completely erase the lines which are commented right now.

pullrequest.title: Deprecate functions to set linear/angular acceleration

content.raw:
I just ran it through Jenkins and confirmed the warnings:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/431/warnings21Result/
content.html:
